description: Single storey canopy extension to western elevation of nursery. Minor alterations to boundary treatment, fire escape area and fenestration details.
site_name: Community Association Centre New Bentham Court
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

0908 200 - REV A  - EXISTING SITE AND LOCATION PLAN,  0908 201 BENTHAM EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN, 0908 203 BENTHAM EXISTING ROOF PLAN, 0908 204 - REV A EXISTING ELEVATIONS NORTH AND SOUTH, 0908 205 - REV A EXISTING ELEVATIONS EAST AND WEST,  0908 206 BENTHAM EXISTING SECTIONS - AA + BB,  PROPOSED SITE PLAN, 0908-211 REV E PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN, 0908 212 PROPOSED ROOF PLAN, 0908 220B BENTHAM PROPOSED ELEVATIONS NORTH AND SOUTH, 0908_ 221 B PROPOSED ELEVATIONS EAST AND WEST, 0908 230 BENTHAM PROPOSED SECTIONS AA + BB 0908_BM DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT FEBRUARY 2010, SITE PLAN [ LBI REG04131]. 

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1) (a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
